title: IExplodeStep.ReverseRotationDirection
description: Gets or sets whether to reverse the direction of rotation of components in this regular explode step.
returns: True to reverse the direction of rotation of components, false to not
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IExplodeStep::ExplodeStepType
is set to
swAssemblyExplodeStepType_e
.swAssemblyExplodeStepType_Translate.
